db:partintro.db:para: Now that we have taken a comprehensive look at the structured writing algorithms it is time to look at structures.

This section will begin delve down into the various structures that typically go into the design of a markup language, and look at specific issue and potential solutions that arise in each, looking once again at how the approaches of the different domains are different, and the difference that makes to quality and functional lucidityconceptfunctional lucidityfunctional lucidity.
